casebody.data:
No. 119,

Orig.

Connecticut et al. v. New Hampshire. [For earlier order herein, see, e. g., 506 U. S. 1090.]

Motion of the Special Master for award of fees and disbursements granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $129,031 to be paid as follows: Connecticut, Massachusetts, and Rhode Island to each pay $14,336.78 and New Hampshire and the intervening utilities to each pay $43,010.33.

Justice Souter took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
